title: Bug 20672Shift+F10 has wrong keyCode
description: F3A snippet is included below that simply listens for key presses and prints therespective keyCode and state for each.When it's run on any platform otherthan hpux its values for Shift+F10 are:Key Pressed: 16777235.State: 131072However on hpux pressing Shift+F10 gives:Key Pressed: 0.State: 131072This causes an accessibility problem in Eclipse because Shift+F10 is used todisplay the context menu for the currently selected item.It might be another problem case in Widget.setKeyState().
